document.full_text: japanese telecom company ntt docomo inc and u.s. social networking service provider twitter inc will jointly develop a location-based alerting service for smartphone users based on tweets, the nikkei business daily said.
document.title: ntt docomo, twitter to develop location-based alert
lines_and_colors: japanese telecom company ntt docomo inc and u.s. social networking service provider twitter inc will jointly develop a location-based alerting service for smartphone users based on tweets, the nikkei business daily said.
